rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {1200, 1608, 3335, 3336}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {CPE4000, CSE4000, GCO4000, IMS4000}

proh: Students are not permitted to enrol in this unit more than once.
description: FIT4000 is an extension unit for all FIT undergraduate Honours degree students, where appropriate. Entry only available on approval by the Associate Dean (Education) where exceptional circumstances have been determined.
